description: This is first database which contains the results of your experiment, you can use it to play with the app... When you want to make a real database, click New : Database/Corpus

participantFields.help: A field to anonymously identify participants.
participantFields.helpLinguists: A field to anonymously identify your participants (by default it can be a timestamp or a combination of experimenter initials, participant initials and testing day).

participantFields.help: The first name of the participant to be printed on welcome pages and/or result reports.
participantFields.helpLinguists: The first name of the participant to be printed on welcome pages and/or result reports.

participantFields.help: The last name of the participant to be printed on welcome pages and/or result reports.
participantFields.helpLinguists: The last name of the participant to be printed on welcome pages and/or result reports.

participantFields.help: Optional username of the participant, if the participant is registered in the system.
participantFields.helpLinguists: Optional username of the participant, if the participant is registered in the system.

participantFields.help: Optional date of birth of the participant, if required by the experimental analysis (ie participants of 20 months performed differently from participants of 22 months).
participantFields.helpLinguists: Optional date of birth of the participant, if required by the experimental analysis (ie participants of 20 months performed differently from participants of 22 months).

participantFields.help: Optional course or section number, if used by the participants result reports or experimental conditions.
participantFields.helpLinguists: Optional course or section number, if used by the participants result reports or experimental conditions.
